LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.Building_SatelliteCollect: The transport pods have arrived from orbit.
No landing zones found. Transportation of resources from orbit is not possible. Install landing beacons.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.Building_Novax.PowerDesc: Enabling power reception will disable this feature for other buildings. This «Novax» will receive the energy of all satellites tuned to it.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.Satellite.SatelliteDestro: Satellite {0} destroyed due to critical damage.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.Satellite.StartLanding: Satellite {0} starts landing at the spaceport.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.WindowNovax.IsNotCommunic: Unable to contact anyone. The communicator is missing from the satellite structure.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.WindowNovax.NullSpaceship: You have no one to connect with.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.CompSatelliteController.N: There are no satellites to control.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.CompSatelliteController.L: A deadly laser beam emitted from a satellite.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.CompSatelliteController.N: Not enough energy. {0} W required, {1} W available.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.CompSatelliteController.O: Bombardment by shells from orbit. Each cast consumes up to 30 shells.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.CompSatelliteController.L: Landing is possible only on a prepared spaceport with landing beacons.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.IncidentWorker_SpaceshipA: {0} is not far from your orbit. It seems to belong to the ancients and is willing to trade with you. He will stay in orbit for a day until he continues to move.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.IncidentWorker_SatelliteD: Satellite {0} was damaged in a collision with space debris. Current health: {1}. It is recommended to land a satellite for repairs.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.Spaceship.SpaceshipLeave: {0} leaves orbit and continues its movement.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.SatelliteUtility.LowGener: The satellite will not be able to take off with a negative power generation factor.
LanguageData.SpaceExpansion.SatelliteUtility.SizeFail: A satellite cannot exceed {0} cells in all directions.
